title: Jessica Chambers ////// 68
description:
Jessica Chambers ////// 68

TrueCrimeGarage.com

December 6th, 2014 a volunteer fire department is responding to a car blaze call when they are met with the unthinkable. A young woman has been set on fire and left for dead. Media sources are quick to report the woman was trying to communicate with the first responders. She unfortunately passed away shortly after she was attacked. Was the young woman able to name her killer? If she did why would it take a year to make an arrest? With Jessica Chambers' murder the focal point of so many news headlines why does the public know so little about the crime? Tonight we step into the garage and examine this very difficult and horrific case.

Beer of the week - Mississippi Mud - Black & Tan by The Matt Brewing CompanyGarage grade - 3 1/2 bottle caps out of 5

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
